spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The abjurer és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The abjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane Ward
entries: The abjurer has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever the abjurer takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the abjurer takes any remaining damage. When the abjurer casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The alhoon és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The alhoon és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The alhoon has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The alhoon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The alhoon té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Chilling Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The alhoon emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The hag's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament:

3e: {@spell disguise self} (including the form of a Medium humanoid)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The annis fa tres atacs: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Crushing Hug
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 9d6 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 ({@damage 9d6 + 5}) de dany contundent at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Només Coven)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic and is {@condition blinded} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition blinded}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

headerEntries: For a death coven, replace the spell list of the hags' Shared Spellcasting trait with the following spells:

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Només Coven)
headerEntries: For a nature coven, replace the spell list of the hags' Shared Spellcasting trait with the following spells:

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Només Coven)
headerEntries: For a prophecy coven, replace the spell list of the hags' Shared Spellcasting trait with the following spells:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The apprentice és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 1. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The archdruid is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Canviar de Forma (2/Dia)
entries: The archdruid magically polymorphs into a beast or elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. The archdruid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The archdruid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls {@condition unconscious}. The archdruid can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn.

While in a new form, the archdruid retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Força, and Destresa are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. It can cast its spells with verbal or somatic components in its new form.
The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Archer's Eye (3/Dia)
entries: As a bonus action, the archer can add {@dice 1d10} to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The archer fa dos atacs with its longbow.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the aurochs moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The babau és Saviesa ({@dc 11} salvació de conjur). The babau pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The babau fa dos atacs melé. It can also use Weakening Gaze before or after making these attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa amb dos mans to make a melee attack.

action.name: Weakening Gaze
entries: The babau targets one creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Força for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Banderhobb
languages: Common and the languages of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resonant Connection
entries: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the banderhobb can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the banderhobb can't use its bite attack or tongue attack on another target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15}. Si falla, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against the target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The banderhobb makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking necrotic damage and becomes stable.

The banderhobb can have only un objectiu swallowed at a time. While the banderhobb isn't {@condition incapacitated}, it can regurgitate the creature at any time (no requereix acció) in a space within 5 feet of it. The creature exits {@condition prone}. If the banderhobb dies, it likewise regurgitates a swallowed creature.

action.name: Shadow Step
entries: The banderhobb magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see. Before or after teleporting, it can make a bite or tongue attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The bard és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de bard preparats:

trait.name: Song of Rest
entries: The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra {@dice 1d6} hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. The bard can confer this benefit on itself as well.

trait.name: Taunt (2/Dia)
entries: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 12} or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The barghest's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The barghest can use its action to polymorph into a Small goblin or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The barghest reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Fire Banishment
entries: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 10 feet high or wide, ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 15} or be instantly banished to Gehenna. Instantaneous bursts of flame (such as a red dragon's breath or a fireball spell) don't have this effect on the barghest.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The barghest has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Soul Feeding
entries: A barghest can feed on the corpse of a humanoid that it killed that has been dead for less than 10 minutes, devouring both flesh and soul in doing so. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the victim's body. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released.

While a humanoid's soul is trapped in a barghest, any form of revival that could work has only a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of doing so, freeing the soul from the barghest if it is successful. Once a creature's soul is digested, however, no mortal magic can return that humanoid to life.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The hag és Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Graystaff Magic
entries: The hag carries a graystaff, a length of gray wood that is a focus for her inner power. She can ride the staff as if it were a {@item broom of flying}. While holding the staff, she can cast additional spells with her Innate Spellcasting trait (these spells are marked with an asterisk). If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost her extra moment.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Maddening Feast
entries: The hag feasts on the corpse of one enemy within 5 feet of her that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within 60 feet of her and able to see her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition frightened} of her for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature is {@condition incapacitated}, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish; the DM controls the creature's movement, which is erratic. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a hag's Maddening Feast durant les properes 24 hores.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic and is {@condition blinded} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition blinded}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

monster.name: Black Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The guard drake pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The blackguard és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de paladí preparats:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The blackguard fa tres atacs with its glaive or its shortbow.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If a {@condition frightened} target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Blue Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Bodak
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Aura of Annihilation
entries: The bodak can activate or deactivate this feature as a bonus action. While active, the aura deals 5 necrotic damage to any creature that ends its turn within 30 feet of the bodak. Undead and fiends ignore this effect.

trait.name: Death Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the bodak's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak, the bodak can force it to make a {@dc 13} Constitució saving throw if the bodak isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, unless it is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition. Otherwise, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany psíquic on a failed save.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the bodak until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the bodak in the meantime, it must immediately make the saving throw.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The bodak takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. it té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Withering Gaze
entries: One creature that the bodak can see within 60 feet of it ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Boggle Oil
entries: The boggle excretes nonflammable oil from its pores. The boggle chooses whether the oil is slippery or sticky and can change the oil on its skin from one consistency to another as a bonus action.
Slippery Oil: While coated in slippery oil, the boggle gains advantage on Destresa (Acrobàcies) checks made to escape bonds, squeeze through narrow spaces, and end grapples.

Sticky Oil: While coated in sticky oil, the boggle gains advantage on Força (Atletisme) checks made to grapple and any ability check made to maintain a hold on another creature, a surface, or an object. The boggle can also climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Dimensional Rift
entries: As a bonus action, the boggle can create an {@condition invisible} and immobile rift within an opening or frame it can see within 5 feet of it, provided that the space is no bigger than 10 feet on any side. The dimensional rift bridges the distance between that space and any point within 30 feet of it that the boggle can see or specify by distance and direction (such as "30 feet straight up"). While next to the rift, the boggle can see through it and is considered to be next to the destination as well, and anything the boggle puts through the rift (including a portion of its body) emerges at the destination. Only the boggle can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the boggle's next turn.

trait.name: Uncanny Smell
entries: The boggle has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Pummel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Oil Puddle
entries: The boggle creates a puddle of oil that is either slippery or sticky (boggle's choice). The puddle is 1 inch deep and covers the ground in the boggle's space. The puddle is difficult terrain For all creatures except boggles and lasts for 1 hour.
If the oil is slippery, any creature that enters the puddle's area or starts its turn there ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11} or fall {@condition prone}.

If the oil is sticky, any creature that enters the puddle's area or starts its turn there ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition restrained}. On its turn. a creature can use an action to try to extricate itself from the sticky puddle, ending the effect and moving into the nearest safe unoccupied space with a successful {@dc 11} Força check.

items.name: Wild Magic
entries: Each time the goblin casts a spell (including cantrips), there is an accompanying surge of wild magic; roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} to determine the wild magic effect.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The goblin can cast a randomly determined {@filter 1st-level wizard spell|spells|level=1|class=wizard} once per day. Intel·ligència is its spellcasting ability ({@dc 10} salvada de conjur, {@hit 2} a impactar amb atacs màgics).

monster.name: Booyahg Slave of the Great Old One

_copy.name: Warlock of the Great Old One

items.name: Khurgorbaeyag's Gift
entries: Khurgorbaeyag saw fit to gift this goblin with powers that enable it to dominate others. The goblin has {@dice 1d3} other {@creature goblin||goblins} that slavishly obey its orders.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: The goblin found a magic item (a {@item necklace of fireballs}, a {@item circlet of blasting}, or the like) and learned how to use it.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Força amb {@dc 14} o be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 6d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The catoblepas has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 16} o be {@condition stunned} until the start of the catoblepas's next turn.

action.name: Death Ray {@recharge 5}
entries: The catoblepas targets a creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target instead takes 64 necrotic damage. The target dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this ray.

trait.name: Adhesive Filament
entries: The cave fisher can use its action to extend a sticky filament up to 60 feet, and the filament adheres to anything that touches it. A creature adhered to the filament is {@condition grappled} by the cave fisher ({@dc 13} per escapar), and ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage. The filament can be attacked (AC 15; 5 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage), but a weapon that fails to sever it becomes stuck to it, requiring an action and a successful {@dc 13} Força check to pull free. Destroying the filament causes no damage to the cave fisher, which can extrude a replacement filament on its next turn

trait.name: Flammable Blood
entries: If the cave fisher drops to half its hit points or fewer, it gains vulnerability to fire damage.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The cave fisher pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cave fisher fa dos atacs with its claws.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Filament
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the cave fisher's adhesive filament ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13}, provided that the target weighs 200 pounds or less. On a failure, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cave fisher, and the cave fisher makes a claw attack against it as a bonus action. Reeling up the target releases anyone else who was attached to the filament. Until the grapple ends on the target, the cave fisher can't extrude another filament.

trait.name: Indomable (2/Dia)
entries: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Recuperar l'Alè (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant, mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany tallant if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The chitine has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and the chitine no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the chitine té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the chitine knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The chitine ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac

entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The choldrith has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and the choldrith no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The choldrith pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the choldrith té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Web Sense

trait.name: Web Walker

entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 11} Força check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The giant's és Saviesa ({@dc 15} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

headerEntries: The giant és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The giant has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The giant has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant fa dos atacs with its morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany contundent. The attack deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent. The attack deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage if the giant has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The giant magically polymorphs into a beast or humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Any equipment the giant is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The conjurer és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és intelligence (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The conjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after the Conjurer Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
entries: As a bonus action, the conjurer teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the cow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the cranium rat can shed dim light from its brain in a 5-foot radius or extinguish the light.

trait.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Death Flash
entries: When the darkling dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the darkling has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the darkling has advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Death Burn
entries: When the darkling elder dies, magical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. On a failure, the creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany radiant and, if the creature can see the light, is {@condition blinded} fins el final del seu proper torn. If the saving throw is successful, the creature takes half the damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The darkling elder fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the darkling elder had advantage on the attack roll, the attack deals as: extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Darkness (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The darkling elder casts {@spell darkness} without any components. Saviesa is its spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Lightning Blood
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the death kiss takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany elèctric whenever it hits the death kiss with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The death kiss makes three tentacle attacks. Up to three of these attacks can be replaced by Blood Drain, one replacement per tentacle grappling a creature

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the death kiss can't use the same tentacle on another target. The death kiss has ten tentacles.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by a tentacle of the death kiss ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric, and the death kiss regains half as many hit points.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The deep rothé's spellcasting ability is Carisma. It can innately cast {@spell dancing lights} at will, sense requerir components.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

walk.condition: (20 ft. and swim 40 ft. en forma híbrida)

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The deep scion can use its action to polymorph into a humanoid-piscine hybrid form, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its speed, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The deep scion reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Amphibious (Només en forma de Hybrid)
entries: The deep scion pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: En forma d'humanoide, the deep scion fa dos atacs melé. En forma híbrida, the deep scion fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Battleaxe (Només en Forma Humanoide)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Psychic Screech (Hybrid Form Only; es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The deep scion emits a terrible scream audible within 300 feet. Creatures within 30 feet of the deep scion ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the deep scion's next turn. In water, the psychic screech also telepathically transmits the deep scion's memories of the last 24 hours to its master, regardless of distance, so long as it and its master are in the same body of water.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el deinonychus es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 12}. Si falla, està {@condition prone}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition prone}, el deinonychus pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The deinonychus fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devourer makes two claw attacks and can use either Imprison Soul or Soul Rend.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Imprison Soul
entries: The devourer chooses a living humanoid with 0 hit points that it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature is teleported inside the devourer's ribcage and imprisoned there. A creature imprisoned in this manner has disadvantage on death saving throws. If it dies while imprisoned, the devourer regains 25 hit points, immediately recharges Soul Rend, and gains an additional action on its next turn. Additionally, at the start of its next turn, the devourer regurgitates the slain creature as a bonus action, and the creature becomes an undead. If the victim had 2 or fewer Hit Dice, it becomes a zombie. if it had 3 to 5 Hit Dice, it becomes a ghoul. Otherwise, it becomes a wight. A devourer can imprison only one creature at a time.

action.name: Soul Rend {@recharge}
entries: The devourer creates a vortex of life-draining energy in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each humanoid in that area ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Increase the damage by 10 for each living humanoid with 0 hit points in that area.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The diviner és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 15. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The diviner has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: * Divination spell of 1st level or higher

trait.name: Portent (Recharges after the Diviner Casts a Divination Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
entries: When the diviner or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the diviner can roll a {@dice d20} and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the dolphin moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The dolphin pot aguantar la respiració durant 20 minuts.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The draegloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 11} per salvar conjur). The draegloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The draegloth té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The draegloth fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Elder Brain
languages: and Undercommon però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The elder brain és Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Creature Sense
entries: The elder brain is aware of the presence of creatures within 5 miles of it that have an Intel·ligència score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each one's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a {@spell mind blank} spell, a {@spell nondetection} spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the elder brain falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The elder brain té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Telepathic Hub
entries: The elder brain can use its telepathy to initiate and maintain telepathic conversations with up to ten creatures at a time. The elder brain can let those creatures telepathically hear each other while connected in this way.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) and takes 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany psíquic a l'inici de cada torn seu until the grapple ends. The elder brain can have up to four targets {@condition grappled} at a time.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The elder brain magically emits psychic energy. Creatures of the elder brain's choice within 60 feet of ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 18}  qui falli rep 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Psychic Link
entries: The elder brain targets one {@condition incapacitated} creature it can perceive with its Creature Sense trait and establishes a psychic link with that creature. Until the psychic link ends, the elder brain can perceive everything the target senses. The target becomes aware that something is linked to its mind once it is no longer {@condition incapacitated}, and the elder brain can terminate the link at any time (no requereix acció). The target can use an action on its turn to attempt to break the psychic link, doing so with a successful {@dc 18} Carisma saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic. The psychic link also ends if the target and the elder brain are more than 5 miles apart, with no consequences to the target. The elder brain can form psychic links with up to ten creatures at a time.

action.name: Sense Thoughts
entries: The elder brain targets a creature with which it has a psychic link. The elder brain gains insight into the target's reasoning, its emotional state, and thoughts that loom large in its mind (including things the target worries about, loves, or hates). The elder brain can also make a Carisma (Deception) check with advantage to deceive the target's mind into thinking it believes one idea or feels a particular emotion. The target contests this attempt with a Saviesa (Insight) check. If the elder brain succeeds, the mind believes the deception for 1 hour or until evidence of the lie is presented to the target.

legendary.name: Tentacle
entries: The elder brain makes a tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Break Concentration
entries: The elder brain targets a creature within 120 feet of it with which it has a psychic link. The elder brain breaks the creature's concentration on a spell it has cast. The creature also takes {@dice 1d4} de dany psíquic per level of the spell.

legendary.name: Psychic Pulse
entries: The elder brain targets a creature within 120 feet of it with which it has a psychic link. Enemies of the elder brain within 10 feet of that creature take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic.

legendary.name: Sever Psychic Link
entries: The elder brain targets a creature within 120 feet of it with which it has a psychic link. The elder brain ends the link, causing the creature to have disadvantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the end of the creature's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The enchanter és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The enchanter has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm (Recharges after the Enchanter Casts an Enchantment Spell of 1st level or Higher)
entries: The enchanter tries to magically divert an attack made against it, provided that the attacker is within 30 feet of it and visible to it. The enchanter must decide to do so before the attack hits or misses.

The attacker ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14}. Si falla, the attacker targets the creature closest to it, other than the enchanter or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The evoker és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The evoker has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Sculpt Spells
entries: When the evoker casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, it can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Dual Shields
entries: The giant carries two shields, each of which is accounted for in the giant's AC. The giant must stow or drop one of its shields to hurl rocks.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two fireshield attacks.

action.name: Fireshield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Shield Charge
entries: The giant moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, it makes a fireshield attack against that creature. If the attack hits, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 21} Força saving throw or be pushed ahead of the giant for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition prone} and takes 18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) de dany contundent, o 29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) de dany contundent if it was already {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The firenewt és Carisma. It can innately cast {@spell mage armor} (self only) at will, requiring no material components.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The firenewt és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Recupera les ranures de conjur quan acaba un Descans Curt o Llarg. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The firenewt pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Imix's Blessing
entries: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The firenewt pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The firenewt fa dos atacs with its scimitar.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spit Fire (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The firenewt spits fire at a creature within 10 feet of it. La criatura ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de foc si falla, or half as much damage on a successful one

trait.name: Antimagic Shell
entries: The snail has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature making a spell attack against the snail has disadvantage on the attack roll. If the snail succeeds on its saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses it, an additional effect might occur, as determined by rolling a {@dice d6}:

items.name: 1–2.
items.entry: If the spell affects an area or has multiple targets, it fails and has no effect. If the spell targets only the snail, it has no effect on the snail and is reflected back at the caster, using the spell slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

items.name: 3–4.
items.entry: No additional effect.

items.name: 5–6.
items.entry: The snail's shell converts some of the spell's energy into a burst of destructive force. Each creature within 30 feet of the snail ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}, taking {@dice 1d6} de dany de força per level of the spell on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Flail Tentacles
entries: The flail snail has five flail tentacles. Whenever the snail takes 10 damage or more on a single turn, one of its tentacles dies. If even one tentacle remains, the snail regrows all dead ones within {@dice 1d4} days. If all its tentacles die, the snail retracts into its shell, gaining total cover, and it begins wailing, a sound that can be heard for 600 feet, stopping only when it dies {@dice 5d6} minutes later. Healing magic that restores limbs, such as the regenerate spell, can halt this dying process.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The flail snail makes as many flail tentacle attacks as it has flail tentacles, all against the same target.

action.name: Flail Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Scintillating Shell (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The snail's shell emits dazzling, colored light until the end of the snail's next turn. During this time, the shell sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet, and creatures that can see the snail have disadvantage on attack rolls against it. In addition, any creature within the bright light and able to see the snail when this power is activated ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} until the light ends.

action.name: Defensa Closca
entries: The flail snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to AC until it emerges. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

trait.name: Aura of Blood Thirst
entries: If the flind isn't {@condition incapacitated}, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The flind fa tres atacs: one with each of its different flail attacks or three with its longbow.

action.name: Flail of Madness
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the target must make a melee attack against a random target within its abast on its next turn. If it has no targets within its abast even after moving, it loses its action on that turn.

action.name: Flail of Pain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Flail of Paralysis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 16} o be {@condition paralyzed} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The froghemoth pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Shock Susceptibility
entries: If the froghemoth takes lightning damage, it suffers several effects fins el final del seu proper torn. its speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Destresa saving throws, it can't use reactions or Multiattack, and on its turn, it can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The froghemoth fa dos atacs with its tentacles. It can also use its tongue or bite.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the froghemoth can't use this tentacle on another target. The froghemoth has four tentacles.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany perforant, and the target is swallowed if it is a Medium or smaller creature. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the froghemoth, and takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the froghemoth's turns.

The froghemoth's gullet can hold up to two creatures at a time. If the Froghemoth takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the Froghemoth ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the froghemoth. Si the froghemoth mor, una criatura empassada ja no està {@condition restrained} i pot escapar del cadàver fent servir 10 peus de moviment. Surt {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tongue
entries: The Froghemoth targets one Medium or smaller creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 18}. Si falla, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the froghemoth, and the froghemoth can make a bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Extra Heads
entries: The giant has a {@chance 25|25 percent} chance of having more than one head. If it has more than one, it has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The giant recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the giant takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The giant dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Vaprak's Rage (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the giant is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the giant gains the following benefits:
- The giant has advantage on Força checks and Força saving throws
- When it makes a melee weapon attack, the giant gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.
- The giant has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant fa dos atacs with its greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany tallant, o 30 ({@damage 3d12 + 11}) de dany tallant while raging.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Stunning Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the gauth's central eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the gauth, the gauth can force it to make a {@dc 14} Saviesa saving throw if the gauth isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. A creature that fails the save is {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the gauth in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the gauth dies, the magical energy within it explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de força; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The gauth shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Devour Magic Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or have one of its magic items lose all magical properties until the start of the gauth's next turn. If the object is a charged item, it also loses {@dice 1d4} charges. Determine the affected item randomly, ignoring single-use items such as potions and scrolls.

items.name: 2. Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 3. Pushing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be pushed up to 15 feet directly away from the gauth and have its speed halved until the start of the gauth's next turn.

items.name: 4. Fire Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc.

items.name: 5. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 6. Sleep Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or fall asleep and remain {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the gazer can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The gazer can mimic simple sounds of speech it has heard, in any language. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 10} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The gazer shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one or two targets it can see within 60 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Dazing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the gazer's next turn. While the target is {@condition charmed} in this way, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls.

items.name: 2. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the gazer's next turn.

items.name: 3. Frost Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

items.name: 4. Telekinetic Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature that is Medium or smaller, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 12} or be moved up to 30 feet directly away from the gazer.

If the target is an object weighing 10 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, the gazer moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. The gazer can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a container.

variant.name: Gazer Familiar
entries: Spellcasters who are interested in unusual familiars find that gazers are eager to serve someone who has magical power, especially those who make a point of bullying and harassing others. The gazer behaves aggressively toward creatures smaller than itself, and it tends to randomly attack house pets, farm animals, and even children in town unless its master is very strict. A gazer serving as a familiar has the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The gazer can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master, provided that the master is at least a 3rd-level spellcaster. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the gazer senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. If its master causes it physical harm, the gazer will end its service as a familiar, breaking the telepathic bond.

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fire Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. The fire s'extèn per les cantonades, and it ignites flammable objects in that area que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The girallon té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The girallon fa cinc atacs: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar. 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gnoll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its shortsword.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Sudden Rush
entries: Until the end of the turn, the gnoll's speed increases by 60 feet and it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gnoll makes two melee attacks with its spear or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant si s'usa amb dos mans to make a melee attack.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet fins el final del seu proper torn.

monster.name: Gnoll Witherling
languages: understands Gnoll però no pot parlar

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the witherling reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The witherling fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its club, or two with its club.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Vengeful Strike
entries: In response to a gnoll being reduced to 0 hit points within 30 feet of the witherling, the witherling makes a melee attack.

monster.name: Green Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The guard drake pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The grung pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The grung pot arribar a saltar 25 peus de longitud i 15 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí.

variant.name: Grung Poison
entries: Grung poison loses its potency 1 minute after being removed from a grung. A similar breakdown occurs if the grung dies. A creature {@condition poisoned} by a grung can suffer an additional effect that varies depending on the grung's skin color. This effect lasts until the creature is no longer {@condition poisoned} by the grung.

entries.name: Green
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature can't move except to climb or make standing jumps. If the creature is flying, it can't take any actions or reactions unless it lands.

entries.name: Blue
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must shout loudly or otherwise make a loud noise at the start and end of its turn.

entries.name: Purple
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature feels a desperate need to soak itself in liquid or mud. It can't take actions or move except to do so or to abast a body of liquid or mud.

entries.name: Red
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must use its action to eat if food is within reach.

entries.name: Orange
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition frightened} of its allies.

entries.name: Gold
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition charmed} and can speak Grung.

entries: The grung pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Mesmerizing Chirr {@recharge}
entries: The grung makes a chirring noise to which grungs are immune. Each humanoid or beast that is within 15 feet of the grung and able to hear ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the grung's next turn.

A creature {@condition poisoned} by a grung can suffer an additional effect that varies depending on the grung's skin color. This effect lasts until the creature is no longer {@condition poisoned} by the grung.

entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition frightened} of its allies.

entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition charmed} and can speak Grung.
