entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature must use its action to eat if food is within reach.

entries.name: Orange
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition frightened} of its allies.

entries.name: Gold
entries: The {@condition poisoned} creature is {@condition charmed} and can speak Grung.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The hobgoblin és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Arcane Advantage
entries: Un cop per torn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Army Arcana
entries: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The hobgoblin és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 2. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hobgoblin fa quatre atacs, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Shadow Jaunt
entries: The hobgoblin magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The illithilich és Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament, sense requerir components.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The illithilich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the illithilich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed illithilich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The illithilich té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The illithilich té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) and ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 20} or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the lich. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the lich kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The illithilich emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

legendary.name: Tentacles
entries: The illithilich makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary.name: Extract Brain (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The illithilich uses Extract Brain.

legendary.name: Explosió Mental (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The illithilich recharges its Explosió Mental and uses it.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 1–3 Actions)
entries: The illithilich uses a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, o 3rd-level spell that it has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The illusionist és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The illusionist has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Displacement (Recharges after the Illusionist Casts an Illusion Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
entries: As a bonus action, the illusionist projects an illusion that makes the illusionist appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the illusionist. The effect ends if the illusionist takes damage, it is {@condition incapacitated}, or its speed becomes 0.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The ki-rin's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). The ki-rin pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The ki-rin és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 18. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the ki-rin falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ki-rin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The ki-rin's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ki-rin fa tres atacs: two with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The ki-rin makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) or una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Perspicàcia}).

legendary.name: Smite
entries: The ki-rin makes a hoof attack or casts sacred flame.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The ki-rin moves up to its half its speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

trait.name: Dragon's Resistance
entries: The kobold has resistance to a type of damage based on the color of dragon that invested it with power (choose or roll a {@dice d10}): 1–2, acid (black); 3–4, cold (white); 5–6, fire (red); 7–8, lightning (blue); 9–10, poison (green).

trait.name: Heart of the Dragon
entries: If the kobold is {@condition frightened} or {@condition paralyzed} by an effect that allows a saving throw, it can repeat the save at the start of its turn to end the effect on itself and all kobolds within 30 feet of it. Any kobold that benefits from this trait (including the dragonshield) has advantage on its next attack roll.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kobold's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the kobold té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kobold fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the kobold té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kobold's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Weapon Invention
entries: The kobold uses one of the following options (roll a {@dice d8} or choose one); the kobold can use each one no more than once per day:

items.name: 1. Acid.
items.entry: The kobold hurls a flask of {@item Acid (vial)|phb|acid}. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5/20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid.

items.name: 2. Alchemist's fire.
items.entry: The kobold throws a flask of {@item Alchemist's Fire (flask)|phb|alchemist's fire}. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5/20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc at the start of each of the target's turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a {@dc 10} Destresa check to extinguish the flames.

items.name: 3. Basket of Centipedes.
items.entry: The kobold throws a small basket into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it. A {@creature swarm of centipedes||swarm of insects (centipedes)} with 11 hit points emerges from the basket and rolls initiative. Al final de cada torn de the swarm, there's a {@chance 50} chance that the swarm disperses.

items.name: 4. Green Slime Pot.
items.entry: The kobold throws a clay pot full of green slime at the target, and it breaks open on impact. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5/20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}The target is covered in a patch of {@hazard green slime} (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). Miss: A patch of green slime covers a randomly determined 5-foot-square section of wall or floor within 5 feet of the target.

items.name: 5. Rot Grub Pot.
items.entry: The kobold throws a clay pot into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it, and it breaks open on impact. A {@creature Swarm of Rot Grubs|vgm|swarm of rot grubs} (see appendix A) emerges from the shattered pot and remains a hazard in that square.

items.name: 6. Scorpion on a Stick.
items.entry: The kobold makes a melee attack with a scorpion tied to the end of a 5-foot-long pole. {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 9}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 7. Skunk in a Cage.
items.entry: The kobold releases a skunk into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The skunk has a walking speed of 20 feet, AC 10, 1 hit point, and no effective attacks. It rolls initiative and, on its turn, uses its action to spray musk at a random creature within 5 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 9}. Si falla, the target retches and can't take actions for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. A creature that doesn't need to breathe or is immune to poison automatically succeeds on the saving throw. Once the skunk has sprayed its musk, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

items.name: 8. Wasp Nest in a Bag.
items.entry: The kobold throws a small bag into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it. A {@creature swarm of wasps||swarm of insects (wasps)} with 11 hit points emerges from the bag and rolls initiative. Al final de cada torn de the swarm, there's a {@chance 50} chance that the swarm disperses.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The kobold és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de fetiller preparats:

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The kobold has 3 sorcery points. It regains all its spent sorcery points when it finishes a long rest. It can spend its sorcery points on the following options:

Heightened Spell: When it casts a spell that forces a creature to a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the kobold can spend 3 sorcery points to give un objectiu of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Subtle Spell: When the kobold casts a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature it at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the kobold té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The korred és Saviesa (save {@dc 13}). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

1e: {@spell conjure elemental} (as 6th-level spell; {@creature galeb duhr}, {@creature gargoyle}, {@creature earth elemental}, or {@creature xorn} only)

trait.name: Command Hair
entries: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or become {@condition grappled} by the rope ({@dc 13} per escapar). Until this grapple ends. the target is {@condition restrained}. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes {@condition incapacitated}.

A rope of korred hair has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The korred has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Stone's Força
entries: While on the ground, the korred deals 2 extra dice of damage with any weapon attack (included in its attacks).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The korred fa dos atacs with its greatclub or hurls two rocks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany contundent, o 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany contundent, o 24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) de dany contundent if the korred is on the ground.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The priest's spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The priest pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Toc Atronador
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany de tro.

action.name: Veu del Kraken (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: A kraken speaks through the priest with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of the priest's choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Un objectiu {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The leucrotta has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Kicking Retreat
entries: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Saviesa (Insight) check.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The leucrotta fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its hooves.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or drop one item it is holding (adept's choice).
The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the adept's next turn.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 3}. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.

monster.name: Master Thief
languages: any one language (usually Common) plus Argot de Lladres

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of its turns, the thief pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: The thief deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the thief doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thief fa tres atacs with its shortsword.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The thief halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Maw Demon
languages: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the maw demon can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any beast or humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 15}; {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mind flayer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) and ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

trait.name: Telepathic Hub
entries: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mindwitness fa dos atacs: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) de dany psíquic. if the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar) and ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The mindwitness shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Aversion Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 2. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Psychic Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 13} or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany psíquic.

items.name: 4. Slowing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 5. Stunning Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw a l'inici de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 6. Telekinetic Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, it ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, the mindwitness moves it up to 30 feet in any direction, and it is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the mindwitness's next turn or until the mindwitness is {@condition incapacitated}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The mindwitness can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The morkoth is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intel·ligència (save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The morkoth has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The morkoth pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The morkoth fa tres atacs: two with its bite and one with its tentacles or three with its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends. the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) de dany contundent at the start of each of the morkoth's turns. and the morkoth can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Hypnosis
entries: The morkoth projects a 30-foot cone of magical energy. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the morkoth for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target tries to get as close to the morkoth as possible, using its actions to Dash until it is within 5 feet of the morkoth. A {@condition charmed} target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the morkoth's Hypnosis for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the morkoth makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the morkoth can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 120 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the morkoth. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

trait.name: Mouth of Madness
entries: The giant is immune to {@spell confusion} spells and similar magic.

On each of its turns, the giant uses all its movement to move toward the nearest creature or whatever else it might perceive as food. Roll a {@dice d10} at the start of each of the giant's turns to determine its action for that turn:

1–3. The giant fa tres atacs with its fists against one random target within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls fins el final del seu proper torn.
4–5. The giant makes one attack with its fist against every creature within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant makes one fist attack against itself.

6–7. The giant makes one attack with its bite against one random target within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, its eyes glaze over and it becomes {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

8–10. The giant fa tres atacs against one random target within its reach: one attack with its bite and two with its fists. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, and the giant magically regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The necromancer és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Grim Harvest (1/Torn)
entries: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Toc Pansidor
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Mental Fortitude
entries: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and the neogi no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The neogi pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The neogi fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Enslave (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be magically {@condition charmed} by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Mental Fortitude
entries: The hatchling has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, and the hatchling no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The hatchling pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: {@spell eldritch blast} (300 peus d'abast, +4 bonus to each damage roll)

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Enslave (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be magically {@condition charmed} by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The neothelid és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Creature Sense
entries: The neothelid is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intel·ligència score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's Intel·ligència score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The neothelid té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany contundent mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 18} or be swallowed by the neothelid. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the neothelid, and it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the neothelid's turns.

Si the neothelid rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the neothelid. If the neothelid dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The neothelid exhales acid en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The nilbog's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Nilbogism
entries: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a {@dc 12} Carisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

trait.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Fool's Scepter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries: In response to another creature dealing damage to the nilbog, the nilbog reduces the damage to 0 and regains {@dice 1d6} hit points.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Foe Smiter of Ilneval
entries: The orc deals an extra die of damage when it hits with a longsword attack (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orc makes two melee attacks with its longsword or two ranged attacks with its javelins. If Ilneval's Command is available to use, the orc can use it after these attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dos mans.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ilneval's Command (Recharges 4–6)
entries: Up to three allied orcs within 120 feet of this orc that can hear it can use their reactions to each make one weapon attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The orc és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orc makes two claw attacks, or four claw attacks if it has fewer than half of its hit points remaining.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Orc Hand of Yurtrus
languages: understands Common and Orc però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The orc és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no verbal components to cast its spells. The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Touch of the White Hand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Corrupted Carrier
entries: When the orc is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and any creature within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, the creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí and becomes {@condition poisoned}. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. A creature {@condition poisoned} by this effect can repeat the save at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. While {@condition poisoned} by this effect, a creature can't regain hit points.

trait.name: Nurtured One of Yurtrus
entries: The orc has advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Corrupted Vengeance
entries: The orc reduces itself to 0 hit points, triggering its Corrupted Carrier trait.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of its turns, the orc pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Hand of Shargaas
entries: The orc deals 2 extra dice of damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack (included in its attacks).

trait.name: Shargaas's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the orc's darkvision.

trait.name: Slayer
entries: In the first round of a combat, the orc has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet. If the orc hits a creature that round who was surprised, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orc makes two scimitar or dart attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Veil of Shargaas (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The orc casts {@spell darkness} without any components. Saviesa is its spellcasting ability.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The oxen is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Blurred Movement
entries: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Red Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks.

trait.name: Outsize Força
entries: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The redcap fa tres atacs with its wicked sickle.

action.name: Wicked Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ironbound Pursuit
entries: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or take 20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Madcap
entries: A madcap is a redcap that soaks its hat in demon ichor instead of blood. Contact with demon ichor makes the creature even more psychotic, causing it to brood over irrational hatreds. A group of madcaps will sometimes band together over a shared hatred of something, such as music, creatures with curly hair, the word "cool," or the color blue.

When a madcap drops to 0 hit points, its hateful existence comes to an end in spectacular fashion as it bursts into flames, reducing itself, its ichor-soaked hat, and its pants to ashes instantly while leaving behind its weapon and smoldering iron boots.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Sea Spawn
languages: understands Aquan and Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sea spawn can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the sea at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sea spawn fa tres atacs: two unarmed strikes and one with its Piscine Anatomy.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Piscine Anatomy
entries: The sea spawn has one or more of the following attack options, provided it has the appropriate anatomy:

items.name: Bite.
items.entry: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Poison Quills.
items.entry: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Tentacle.
items.entry: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the sea spawn can't use this tentacle on another target.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Ethereal Awareness
entries: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The shadow mastiff has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Shadow Blend
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Shadow Mastiff Alpha
entries: A shadow mastiff alpha has the statistics of a normal shadow mastiff, with the following modifications:

items: The alpha has above average (42–54) hit points.
It has the Terrifying Howl action option described below.

entries.name: Terrifying Howl
entries: The shadow mastiff howls. Any beast or humanoid within 300 feet of the mastiff and able to hear its howl ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Un objectiu {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any shadow mastiff's Terrifying Howl for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shoosuva fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail stinger.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 14} o become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned}, the target is also {@condition paralyzed}. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Slithering Tracker
languages: understands languages it knew in its previous form però no pot parlar

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the slithering tracker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While grappling a creature, the slithering tracker takes only haIf the damage dealt to it, and the creature it is grappling takes the other half.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si slithering tracker es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un puddle, unless an observer succeeds on a {@dc 18} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check.

trait.name: Keen Tracker
entries: The slithering tracker has advantage on Saviesa checks to track prey.

trait.name: Liquid Form
entries: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The slithering tracker pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Watery Stealth
entries: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Life Leech
entries: One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the {@condition grappled} target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic a l'inici de cada torn seu. The slithering tracker can grapple only un objectiu at a time.

monster.name: Spawn of Kyuss
languages: comprèn els idiomes que se sabia en vida però no pot parlar

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The spawn of Kyuss recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Worms
entries: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spawn of Kyuss fa dos atacs with its claws and uses Burrowing Worm.

action.name: Burrowing Worm
entries: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw. The worm is a Tiny undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use this action to launch a scraped-off worm at a humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. Al final de cada torn seu thereafter, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic per worm infesting it (maximum of {@dice 10d6}). A worm-infested target dies if it drops to 0 hit points, then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested creature is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
entries: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 13}, provided that the giant isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the giant. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant fa dos atacs with its greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Petrifying Touch
entries: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is {@condition charmed} by it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Si falla, the target becomes {@condition petrified}, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. {@spell Greater restoration} spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a {@condition petrified} creature on the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the {@condition petrified} creature as well as ending the {@condition petrified} condition on it.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The giant pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Lightning Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}40 ({@damage 9d6 + 9}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Windjavelin
entries: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany perforant to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary.name: Gust
entries: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around it. The target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 18} or be pushed up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary.name: Thunderbolt (2 Actions)
entries: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de tro; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: One with the Storm (3 Actions)
entries: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the swarm can shed dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increase the illumination to bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguish the light.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. as well as to all divination spells.

action.name: Bites

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}The target is infested by {@dice 1d4} rot grubs. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@dice 1d6} de dany perforant per rot grub infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these rot grubs. After this time, these rot grubs are too far under the skin to be burned. If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all rot grubs infesting the target.

trait.name: Lightfooted

trait.name: Suave Defense

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Daga

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage

trait.name: Thorny Body

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

action.name: Fiblar

If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned}. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

headerEntries: The transmuter és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The transmuter has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Transmuter's Stone
entries: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted that grants its bearer one of the following effects:
Darkvision out to a range of 60 feet
An extra 10 feet of speed while the bearer is unencumbered
Proficiency with Constitució saving throws
Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever the transmuter chooses this benefit)
If the transmuter has the stone and casts a transmutation spell of 1st level or higher, it can change the effect of the stone.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the trapper is attached to a ceiling, floor, or wall and remains motionless, it is almost indistinguishable from an ordinary section of ceiling, floor, or wall. A creature that can see it and succeeds on a {@dc 20} Intel·ligència (Investigation) or Intel·ligència (Nature) check can discern its presence.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya

Until the grapple ends, the target takes 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn seu. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and at risk of suffocating. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The ulitharid és Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Creature Sense
entries: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intel·ligència score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ulitharid té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Psionic Hub
entries: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. If the ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no requereix acció).

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) and ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the ulitharid. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The ulitharid emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Kiss
entries: The vargouille kisses one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 12} or become cursed. The cursed target loses 1 point of Carisma after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell; don't count that time. When the cursed target's Carisma becomes 2, it dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille. Casting {@spell remove curse}, {@spell greater restoration}, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

action.name: Stunning Shriek
entries: The vargouille shrieks. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the vargouille's next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a target is {@condition stunned}. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Stunning Shriek of all vargouilles for 1 hour.

action.name: Spores (1/Dia)
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vegepygmy. The spores spread around corners. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea that isn't a plant ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition poisoned}. trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a {@dice d10} to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

entries: At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic, provided that the warlock isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

entries: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition frightened} until the end of warlord's next turn.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The wood woad has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneració

If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wood woad's next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: Multi-atac

monster.name: Yeth Hound

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics d'armes no platejades

languages: and Sylvan però no pot parlar

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The yeth hound has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Sunlight Banishment
entries: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany psíquic if the target is {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Baleful Baying
entries: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the hound's next turn or until the hound is {@condition incapacitated}. A {@condition frightened} target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The anathema té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Ophidiophobia Aura
entries: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or become {@condition frightened} of snakes and yuan-ti. Un objectiu {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si un objectiu supera la salvada o se li acaba la condició, és immune a aquest aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Six Heads
entries: The anathema has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}. {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Anathema)

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Anathema)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and takes 16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn seu, and the anathema can't constrict another target.

action.name: Ràfega de Mossegades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí.

variant.name: Acid Slime

variant.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide.

variant.name: Shed Skin (1/Dia)
entries: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

action.name: Invoke Nightmare (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The yuan-ti taps into the nightmares of a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates an illusory, immobile manifestation of the creature's deepest fears, visible only to that creature. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, rep 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic and is {@condition frightened} of the manifestation, believing it to be real. The yuan-ti must concentrate to maintain the illusion (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute and can't be harmed. The target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the illusion on a success, or taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic on a failure.
